title: GenLayer - Combining AI & Smart Contracts (The DeFi Download Podcast)
speaker: Albert Castellana
description:
What if AI could make complex decisions without human bias in a fully decentralized, trustless way?

Piers Ridyard speaks with kstellana CEO & cofounder of Yeager.ai, about GenLayer Protoccol - where AI meets blockchain to create trustless decision-making systems.

title: How GenLayer and Rally Changes Trust and Decision Making
speaker: Albert Castellana
description: Have you ever wondered how AI will improve trust and decision-making in our everyday lives? Watch Albert Castellana talk about how GenLayer and RallyOnChain is changing the way we run businesses!

title: GenLayer: First Intelligent Blockchain | Ft. Albert Castellana | Buildify Podcast
speaker: Albert Castellana
description: GenLayer is a decentralized blockchain platform designed to execute AI-powered smart contracts called Intelligent Contracts which can use AI models to search the web and process natural language instructions. GenLayerâ€™s AI-powered smart contracts can use Large Language Models (LLMs) and access the Internet to make complex decisions in a decentralized manner.
